LanguageData.JRWManipulatorReconstruct.label: Manipulator
LanguageData.JRWManipulatorReconstruct.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #08362-2015 [MANIPULATOR MODIFICAPUTIS] CODENAME: MANTIS >645
An extinct predatory cockroach altered to massive proportions. It is an ancestor to modern day mantids, and acts similarly, with large, grasping legs to grapple prey.
